paragraph.#text:
Your organization electronically submitted an initial case report to determine if reporting to public health is needed for a patient. "Zika virus disease (disorder)" is reportable to
              "State Department of Health". An initial case report was sent to "State Department of Health". Additional information may be required for this report.

content.#text: "Zika virus disease (disorder)" for "State Department of Health"

paragraph: Reporting is required within "24 hours". Reporting to this Public Health Agency is based on "both patient home address and provider facility address".

item.paragraph:
Local mosquito-borne Zika virus transmission was reported in your area. Increased watchfulness for symptoms of Zika virus in your patients is warranted. (Immediate action
                  requested)

#text: Additional information for the required reporting of Zika must be submitted to State Department of Health immediately. This additional information can be submitted here. (
Zika has particular risks for pregnant women. Follow-up guidance for pregnant women and couples who are planning pregnancy. (
Further Laboratory testing for Zika may be needed. Guidance for additional testing and specimen collection (
Forms for submitting further Zika laboratory testing (
If you have additional questions regarding Zika or reporting, contact information for the State Department of Health is available here. (
Control and prevention information for providers (

act.text:
Your organization electronically submitted an initial case report to determine if reporting to public health is needed for a patient. "Zika virus disease (disorder)" is reportable to "State
                Department of Health". An initial case report was sent to "State Department of Health". Additional information may be required for this report.

playingEntity.name: State Department of Health Routing Agency

code.originalText:
Local mosquito-borne Zika virus transmission was reported in your area. Increased watchfulness for symptoms of Zika virus in your patients is
                                  warranted.

Additional information for the required reporting of Zika must be submitted to State Department of Health immediately. This additional information can be submitted
                                  here.
Zika has particular risks for pregnant women. Follow-up guidance for pregnant women and couples who are planning pregnancy.
